EmailTemplate.name: Global_Content Syndication_Ovum_Zipkin_Q316.Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for your interest in Zipkin! To learn more about or get involved with the project visit the OpenZipkin <[[http://zipkin.io/]]> page and the GitHub <[[https://github.com/openzipkin]]> page or check out how Spring Cloud Sleuth <[[https://cloud.spring.io/spring-cloud-sleuth/]]> is integrating technologies like Zipkin to simplify data capture and logging.
Best, The Pivotal Team
